20201.comment: The 'userid' field (User identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
20201.userFriendlyComment: Please provide a valid user ID in the correct format.

20202.comment: The 'username' field (User's display name) must be between 3 and 23 characters long, must contain at least one letter and can contain numbers, and underscores
20202.userFriendlyComment: Username must be 3-23 characters with at least one letter. Numbers and underscores are allowed.

20203.comment: The 'offset' field (Pagination offset for retrieved data) must be an integer between 0 and 200
20203.userFriendlyComment: Page offset must be a number between 0 and 200.

20204.comment: The 'limit' field (Number of data objects to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
20204.userFriendlyComment: Number of items to display must be between 1 and 20.

20205.comment: The 'postLimit' field (Number of posts to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
20205.userFriendlyComment: Number of posts to display must be between 1 and 20.

20206.comment: The 'filterBy' field (Post filter criteria) must be an array containing only valid ENUM options: IMAGE, AUDIO, TEXT, VIDEO, FOLLOWED, FOLLOWER
20206.userFriendlyComment: Please select valid filter options from the available choices.

20207.comment: The 'IgnoreList' field (Whether to apply the block list) must be either 'YES' or 'NO' (ENUM options)
20207.userFriendlyComment: Please specify either YES or NO for the block list option.

20208.comment: The 'sortBy' field (Sorting order for posts) must be one of the following ENUM options: NEWEST, TRENDING, LIKES, DISLIKES, VIEWS, COMMENTS
20208.userFriendlyComment: Please choose a valid sorting option from the available choices.

20209.comment: The 'postid' field (Post identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
20209.userFriendlyComment: Please provide a valid post ID in the correct format.

20210.comment: The 'title' field (Title of the post to search for) must be between 2 and 63 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, dashes (-), and underscores (_)
20210.userFriendlyComment: Post title must be 2-63 characters using letters, numbers, spaces, dashes or underscores.

20211.comment: The 'tag' field (Tags to search for in posts) must be an array of up to five tags, each between 2 and 53 characters long
20211.userFriendlyComment: You can search with up to 5 tags, each 2-53 characters long.

20212.comment: The 'from' field (Starting date for data retrieval) must be a valid date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
20212.userFriendlyComment: Please enter the start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

20213.comment: The 'to' field (End date for data retrieval) must be a valid date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
20213.userFriendlyComment: Please enter the end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

20214.comment: The 'postOffset' field (Pagination offset for posts) must be an integer
20214.userFriendlyComment: Post offset must be a whole number.

20215.comment: The 'commentOffset' field (Pagination offset for comments) must be an integer
20215.userFriendlyComment: Comment offset must be a whole number.

20216.comment: The 'commentLimit' field (Number of comments to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
20216.userFriendlyComment: Number of comments to display must be between 1 and 20.

20217.comment: The 'commentid' field (Comment identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
20217.userFriendlyComment: Please provide a valid comment ID in the correct format.

20218.comment: The 'chatid' field (Chat identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
20218.userFriendlyComment: Please provide a valid chat ID in the correct format.

20219.comment: The 'messageOffset' field (Pagination offset for chat messages) must be an integer
20219.userFriendlyComment: Message offset must be a whole number.

20220.comment: The 'messageLimit' field (Number of chat messages to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
20220.userFriendlyComment: Number of messages to display must be between 1 and 20.

20221.comment: The 'searchChatByName' field (Search for chats by name) must be a valid string
20221.userFriendlyComment: Please enter a valid chat name to search.

20222.comment: The 'searchChatByUser' field (Find all chats with a specific friend as a participant) must be a valid string
20222.userFriendlyComment: Please enter a valid username to search for chats.

20223.comment: The 'day' field (Timeframe selection for data retrieval) must be one of the following ENUM options: D0, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, W0, M0, Y0
20223.userFriendlyComment: Please select a valid timeframe option from the available choices.

20224.comment: The 'email' field (User's email address) must be a valid email format
20224.userFriendlyComment: Please enter a valid email address.

20225.userFriendlyComment: Please enter your current password to update your email.

20226.userFriendlyComment: New password must be 8-128 characters with at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.

20227.comment: The 'expassword' field (User's current password) is required to update the password
20227.userFriendlyComment: Please enter your current password to set a new one.

20228.userFriendlyComment: Bio must be between 3 and 5000 characters.

20229.userFriendlyComment: Profile picture must be JPG, PNG or GIF under 5MB.

20246.userFriendlyComment: Value cannot exceed the maximum allowed amount.

20247.userFriendlyComment: Please enter a valid decimal number.

20249.userFriendlyComment: Please enter the maximum date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

20250.userFriendlyComment: Please enter the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

20251.userFriendlyComment: The image format is invalid. Please upload a valid image.

20252.comment: The 'message' field must be between 1 and 500 characters long
20252.userFriendlyComment: Message must be between 1 and 500 characters.

20253.comment: The 'phone number' field must be an integer between 9 and 21
20253.userFriendlyComment: Phone number must be 9-21 digits long.

20254.comment: The 'Solana Public Key' field must be a String between 43 and 44 (only including Chars and Ints without 0 O I 1)
20254.userFriendlyComment: Please enter a valid Solana public key (43-44 characters, excluding 0, O, I, 1).

20255.comment: The 'tagName' field (Tag identifier) must be between 2 and 53 characters long, must not contain spaces, and may include letters, numbers, special characters, underscores _, and hyphens - (format: valid-tag_name-123)

20256.userFriendlyComment: Title must be 2-30 characters long. Please shorten or lengthen your title.

20258.userFriendlyComment: Please enter the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

20261.userFriendlyComment: File is too large. Please choose a smaller file.

20262.userFriendlyComment: You can add up to 10 tags, each 2-53 characters long.

20263.userFriendlyComment: Media description must be 3-500 characters long.
